channel.title: Guides on Disorient presents: COUNTRY CLUB XIV - PRESENCE AND THE ETERNAL NOW
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on Disorient presents: COUNTRY CLUB XIV - PRESENCE AND THE ETERNAL NOW

item.title: FAQ
item.description:
Where Exactly Is This?

Upstate New York, 2 1/2 hours north of NYC. Location released to ticketholders week of event.

Can I Leave and Come Back?

Yes, but the gate will be closed overnight. Check gate hours for available in/out hours.

I Need to Resell My Ticket, Is It Possible?

Yes! You can sell or reassign your ticket to someone else.

  • Sell my ticket
  • Edit the name on my order

Can I Have a Personal Fire?

Absolutely, but it must be in a fire dish up off the ground.

item.title: Preparing for Departure
item.description:
How Do I Get There?

Our event takes place near Shandaken, NY, 2 ½ hours north of NYC. We will release the exact location the week of the event.

Transportation Options:

  • DRIVING: 2 ½ hours north of NYC. Exact location released week of 5/21.
  • FLYING: We recommend flying into Newark-EWR and renting a car from the airport. For this option expect 2 ½ hours of drivetime up. Alternatively, fly into Albany-ALB with a 1 ½ hour drive to gate.
  • UBER/LYFT/ETC: People have done it, prices vary
  • RIDESHARE FROM NYC: Check the Rideshare board and the FB event page
  • BUS: Take the Trailways bus to Phoenicia and arrange a friend onsite to scoop you up. Phoenicia Trailways Bus stop is 10 mins away from our gate. Tell the driver your stop is Shandaken. https://webstore.trailways.com/
  • TRAIN: AMTRAK to Rhinecliff Stop ID: RHIN. Closest stop is 50 minutes away from our gate. You must arrange a ride from Rhinecliff.
  • TOWN CAR SERVICE: Woodstock Town Car woodstocktowncar.com (845) 679-6656 Cars, Limos Passenger Vans, service from NYC and Surrounding areas directly to our gate.
  • SMALL PLANES/HELICOPTER: Hunter Mountain Airport, ICAO: 97NY, 26 minutes from gate

We Dream Together

Disorient is offering modest art grants for the creation of selected projects displayed at Country Club. We request that very large art, or art that requires power or fire elements be coordinated with us to ensure that your art can be safely displayed. For more information, email countryclub@disorient.info

item.title: Self Reliance
item.description:
Self Reliance

We Do Not Provide Water

There is no water provided at Country Club. There are no showers, but we provide a sauna. You must bring all the water you will need for the weekend. Recommendation is a little more than 1 gallon per person per day for drinking, cooking and cleaning. There is a local grocery store 10 mins away, in and outs allowed while gate is open. Gate is closed overnight.

item.title: Upon Arrival
item.description:
Welcome to Disorient Country Club. Map is unmarked beyond the basics as we are journeying into the unknown inviting all to explore pathways and regions to find what this year has hidden to discover.

2026 Gate Schedule

GATE IS NOT OPEN 24 HOURS DURING EVENT

  • Thursday: Gates are open Noon to 2AM
  • Friday: Gates are open 9AM to 2AM
  • Saturday: Gates are open 9AM-10PM
  • Sunday: Gate is closed to new arrivals

You will be allowed to go in and out once you have arrived but please, be respectful of the neighbors when you do so. Don’t be loud. No late night trips unless absolutely necessary.

item.title: Leave No Trace
item.description:
LNT Code of Conduct

Country Club is a pack it in, pack it out experience. There are no trash cans onsite.

What’s LNT? What’s MOOP?

LNT is Leave No Trace that you were there. MOOP is Matter Out Of Place. Anything that is not natural to the Country Club grounds is MOOP. Flakes and ashes from burnt material also counts as MOOP. You take out every scrap of material you brought in. That includes all your garbage. DO NOT dispose of anything on the ground. Do a thorough MOOP sweep of your campsite before you leave.

item.title: Disengage
item.description:
If you wish to extend your voyage we encourage you to volunteer for our Disengage team!

  Volunteer with Disengage here.
